title: Experimental Launches from SDSC SHAR
description: Details of experimental missions launched from SDSC SHAR using sounding rockets and test vehicles.
content: Launched from the Sounding Rocket Complex using RH-560M as ATV-D01 mission.

title: Experimental Launches from SDSC SHAR
description: Details of experimental missions launched from SDSC SHAR using sounding rockets and test vehicles.
content: Reusable Launch Vehicle - Technology Demonstrator (HEX-01) launched from First Launch Pad.

title: Experimental Launches from SDSC SHAR
description: Details of experimental missions launched from SDSC SHAR using sounding rockets and test vehicles.
content: DMRJ technology demonstration under ATV-D02 using RH-560M from SRC.

title: Experimental Launches from SDSC SHAR
description: Details of experimental missions launched from SDSC SHAR using sounding rockets and test vehicles.
content: Test Vehicle D1 (TV-D1) mission for Gaganyaan Abort System, launched from FLP.

title: Experimental Launches from SDSC SHAR
description: Details of experimental missions launched from SDSC SHAR using sounding rockets and test vehicles.
content: ATV-D03 mission launched from Sounding Rocket Complex (SRC).
